This page lists a short compilation of larger projects I completed through my coursework at Macomb Community College. As I continue taking courses and doing other work, I will update this page with the client's permission.

Bob's Book Nook (college coursework)link
This was written in VB.NET and interacts with an Access database. The purpose of the page is to act like a simple internet book store. The page linked to is an Admin page where books can be added or deleted, as well as book categories and authors. The default.aspx link on the bottom of the admin page links to the search page of the book store that can search by author, category, or by best seller (all of which are different tables in the database).

The page was designed to be functional more than aesthetic.
NorthPoint Elementary (college coursework)link
This is a mock-up of a fictional elementary school website. It was created for a JavaScript course. The simple site features custom JavaScript used for the rotating images in the sidebar and the form validation and submission confirmation on the contact us page. jQuery is used for the alternating rows on the staff page, and YUI is used for the calendar appointment functionality.

Built using the HTML5 Boilerplate template
